string.text: Well, we're in.
Borland, hurry up.

Take your time, Savannah, you're not leading a squad. You never know what's going on in this lab. If you hear anything suspicious, don't make a fuss. But if you do... Don't forget what you were taught - a spare magazine is always at hand. One more thing: Skidan asked me to look for documents in here. Experimental reports. Promised to pay good money for each one. So keep your eyes open.
Yeah.
Damn, how'd he get me so hooked...
What was that?

It's the controller. They meet closer to the centre of the Zone. What's he doing here? He's a mind-reader, like a telepath. My head's cracking at the seams. If I was any closer, he'd have taken complete control of me. I'd be a zombie. Thanks for saving my ass.
You'll thank me later if we get out of here.
If it wasn't for you...
Nothing to talk about. Let's go!
Looks like we got a problem.
What kind of problem?
There's no power. That's why the lift's not working.

There's got to be a backup generator somewhere. You stay here, I'll see if I can find it and get it running. Or maybe it's just the breaker that cut the power to the lift. I'll look around, see what I can find. Keep in touch, let me know when the lift's running.
Be careful.
Mm-hmm.
You made it, damn it. You're a lively one.
What the fuck? I almost got eaten on the way. Did you find the Oakleys?

There's no Oakleysman. But the Monolith is. There's an ambush up ahead, I can see it on the monitors. There's video cameras all around. There's Monolith. They're heavily armed. Skidan said they're not in the Zone anymore. No, there aren't. Like dogs.
Should we break through? Or are we looking for a way around?

There is no other way. We're already there, I'm gonna open the door for you. Run straight in, the door will close and lock in two seconds. There's some kind of gas inside, be careful. Your suit's got an insulated breathing circuit, so the gas won't hurt you. Unless you get bullet holes in the suit. Then it's a scarecrow! I don't even have a gas mask, my ass.
Open the door, we'll get through.
I'm gonna stay with these computers. I need to find a layout of the interior. If there's a silencer for the machine gun, now would be a good time to put it on the barrel.
Why don't you cover it up?
Gas, I'm telling you. I'll die of gas.
All right, I'll be fine on my own.
